Reference version 0.1.0

Start the app

app

Start ctmm web app

Basic Data Structure for app

Input ctmm telemetry data need to be converted to data.table for app uses

report

Report data summary on telemetry object/list

combine

Generate combined location and info data.table from telemetry object/list

Plot Location and Time

BIGGER_THEME BIGGER_KEY CENTER_TITLE

Override some ggplot2 default theme settings

plot_loc

Plot animal locations subset with all as background

plot_loc_facet

Plot animal locations in facet

plot_time

Plot animal sampling time histogram in facet

Variograms, Home Range Estimation, Occurrence

summary_tried_models

Generate formated model summary table from tried models results

flatten_models

Convert nested par_fit_tele result into flatten list with model names

plot_vario

Plot a group of empirical or modeled variograms.

plot_ud

Plot a group of home ranges or occurrences

Map

base_map

Build a leaflet base map

point_map

Build point map from animal location data table

range_map

Build home range map

point_range_map

Build home range map with animal locations

heat_map

Build heat map from animal location data table

add_control

Add layer control for leaflet map

Parallel Computing

align_list

Combine two lists into one list by aligning each item

par_lapply

Parallel apply function to list in all platforms

par_fit_models

Parallel fitting model on telemetry list

par_try_models

Parallel selecting models on telemetry list

par_occur

Parallel calculate occurrence from telemetry and model list

Misc Utilitiy Functions

calc_distance

Calculate distance to median center for each animal location

calc_speed

Calculate speed for each animal location

pick

Pick subset from telemetry object/list

JS.logify

JS Function To Logify A sliderInput

JS.onload

Register JS logify function for each sliderInput

zip_folder

Compress a folder into zip

get_names

Extract vector of names from data.table
